document_data.name: Shahrokh
document_data.mainbody: '''Shahrokh''' was an extremely powerful [[djinn]] lord and was the [[Alzhedo dictionary#V|vizar]] to the [[Syl-pasha|pasha]] of [[Calimport]].
document_data.Abilities: Shahrokh was a powerful [[mage]] who was even able to penetrate [[Acham el Jhotos]]'s wards to enter the city of [[Almraiven]].
document_data.History: He worked with [[efreet]] to complete the [[Ritual of Return]], which would free [[Calim]] and [[Memnon]] from their prison.
document_data.Appearance: Like most djinn, Shahrokh had no legs; rather, his lower body was a whirlwind. He was larger than most genies.
